title: Calendar Indicator
description: Represents an indicator on the calendar.

Icon.description: Icon to be displayed on the calendar indicator.

Title.description: Title of the calendar indicator, if not defined it will be used `_Name` as Title.

Icon.description: The string value is a style class name of `Icon`. This applies the tint color to the icon of the calendar indicator.

Styles.description: A style to be applied to the indicator in the CalendarSection. Not support Web but Mobile only.
